definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Thee attachments some enjoy with individuals outside the family circle are enough to carry them through life.
sentences.chinese: 對於家庭圈外人的依屬感貫穿了很多人的一生。

sentences.english: Observe the attachment to your pain.
sentences.chinese: 觀察你對痛苦的感情上的依屬。
